"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54122b1f6368723198200200#post_54122b1f6368723198200200
Seriously though, Zetton kicked the shit out of Ultraman without so much as a scratch, (And he would have won if it wasn't for a New military weapon) And King Joe manhandled Seven without even getting a scratch. (Same deal)

They're both Super strong, Joe's a tank, While Zetton can teleport. If we're going with the original Joe, Beams will do jack shit to him.

I think I'm leaning Zetton here.
